message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE 

This paper deals with the task of sentiment analysis, which falls under the category of natural language processing (NLP). Therefore, cs.CL (Computation and Language) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also involves the use of machine learning algorithms for classification, which falls under cs.IR (Information Retrieval) and cs.LG (Machine Learning). Additionally, the paper presents a novel approach for constructing a sentiment lexicon, which involves automatic methods and can be categorized under cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). Finally, the paper deals with the analysis of a specific dialect of Arabic, which can be categorized under cs.NE (Networks and Communications).
